st: Teri Baatoon Ko Tu Seene Sy Laga Rakha Hay,
s:
Teri Baatoon Ko Tu Seene Sy Laga Rakha Hay,
Hoti Teri Tasvir Agr To Use Ankho Mein Basa Leta..!!!

st: Qissa E Gham E Hayat Na Pouch Aye Ajnabi,
s:
Qissa E Gham E Hayat Na Pouch Aye Ajnabi,
Jin Halat Mein Je Rahey Hein Kamal Kr Rahey Hein…

st: Ajnabi Shehar Ke Ajnabi Raaste
s:
Ajnabi Shehar Ke Ajnabi Raaste
Meri Tanhaye Pr Muskrate Rahe
Mein Bahot Door Tak Uoon Hi Chalta Raha
Tum Bahot Deer Tak Yaad Aate Rahe

st: Ajnabi Duniya Mein Akela Khwab Hoon Mein
s:
Ajnabi Duniya Mein Akela Khwab Hoon Mein
Sawaloon Se Ghira Aik Jawab Hoon Mein
Jo Na Samajh Sake Unke Liye Kyun?
Jo Samajhe Unke Liye Ek Kitaab Hoon Mein

st: Wo Ajnabi Tha Tu Mujhse Dil Lagaya Kyun
s:
Wo Ajnabi Tha Tu Mujhse Dil Lagaya Kyun
Is Gair Ko Apna Banaya Kyun
Wo Mera Hota Tu Mujhe Choor Ke Kyun Jata
Wo Mera Nhi Tha Tu Meri Zindagi Mein Aya Kyun

st: Us Ajnabi Ka Yun Na Intezar Karo
s:
Us Ajnabi Ka Yun Na Intezar Karo
Iss Aashiq Dil Ka Na Aitbar Karo
Roj Nikla Kare Kisi Ki Yaad Mein Ansu
Itna Kabhi Kisi Se Na Pyaar Karo

st: Tumhe Ab Bhul Hi Jae Tu Acha Hai
s:
Tumhe Ab Bhul Hi Jae Tu Acha Hai
Ye Fasle Or Bhi Badh Jae Tu Acha Hai
Tumari Chahtein Hum Ko Nhi Hasil
Tu Ab Gair Hi Ban Jaye Tu Acha Hai

st: Hum Aa Ke Tere Shaher Se Wapas Na Jaye
s:
Hum Aa Ke Tere Shaher Se Wapas Na Jaye
Yeh Faisla Kiya Hai Tughe Dekhne Ke Baad
Kehte Hai Tum Ko Log Maseha Mgr Yahan
Ek Shaks Mar Gaya Hai Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

st: Ek Ajnabi Se Mujhe Itna Pyar Kyun Hai
s:
Ek Ajnabi Se Mujhe Itna Pyar Kyun Hai
Inkar Karne Pr Chahat Ka Ikrar Kyun Hai,
Use Pana Nhi Meri Taqdeer Mein Shahid,
Phir Har Mod Pe Usi Ka Intezar Kyun Hai.!

st: Usay Yaqeen Ho Jaye Kuch Is Ada Se
s:
Usay Yaqeen Ho Jaye Kuch Is Ada Se
Sunana Hall-E-Dil Humara Ajnabi …
Woh Khud Hi Keh De Kisi Ko Tarpana Buri Baat Hai

st: Yun Nazar Ki Baat Aur Dil Chura Gay
s:
Yun Nazar Ki Baat Aur Dil Chura Gay
Andheroon Ke Saye Mein Dhadkan Suna Gaye,
Hum Tu Samjhe The “Ajnabi” Aapko,
Ap Tu Humein Apna Bana Gaye

st: Kabhi Jo Hum Pe Jaan Diya Karti Thi
s:
Kabhi Jo Hum Pe Jaan Diya Karti Thi
Jo Kehte Thy Wo Maan Liya Karti Thi
Kal Anjaan Ban Kr Pass Se Guzar Gyi
Woh Jo Door Se Pehchan Liya Karte Thi…

st: Dil Ke Ghar Mein Basne Wale Ajnabi Nahi Hote
s:
Dil Ke Ghar Mein Basne Wale Ajnabi Nahi Hote
Har Waqt Yaad Any Waly Ajnabi Nahi Hoty
Khushi Dene Waly To Apne Hoty Hen
Par!Gham Deny Waly Bhi Ajnabi Nahi Hoty..!

st: Badala na apne aap ko jo the vahi rahe
s:
Badala na apne aap ko jo the vahi rahe
milate rahe sabhi se magar ajanabi rahe
duniya na jit pao to haro na khud ko tum
thodi bahut to zahan mai narazagi rahe
apani tarah sabhi ko kisi ke talash thi
hum jisake bhi qarib rahe dur hi rahe
guzaro jo bag se to dua mangate chalo
jisamen khile hain phul wo dali hari rahe

st: Wo Ajnabi Tha To Mujse Dil Lagaya Kyun?
s:
Wo Ajnabi Tha To Mujse Dil Lagaya Kyun?
Is Gair Ko Apna Banaya Kyun ?
Wo Mera Hota To Mujhe Chhod K Kyun Jata?
Wo Mera Nahi Tha To Meri Zindagi Me Aya Kyun?

st: Jis Shakhs Ki Khatir Ujarha Khud Ko
s:
Jis Shakhs Ki Khatir Ujarha Khud Ko
Kal Shab Ja Raha Tha Ik Ajnabi K Sath

st: Ajnabi Duniya Me Akela Khwab Hu Mei!
s:
Ajnabi Duniya Me Akela Khwab Hu Mei!
Sawalo Se Ghira Ek Jawab Hu Mei!
Jo Na Samajh Sake Unke Lie Koun?
Jo Samajhe Unke Lie Ek Kitaab Hu Mei

st: Ajnabee Mehfil Main Kisi Se Dil Na Lagana.
s:
Ajnabee Mehfil Main Kisi Se Dil Na Lagana.
Suna Hai Bin Bulaye Anay Waly Bin Bataye Chaly Bhi Jate Hain.

st: Usay Yaqeen Ho Jaye Kuch Iss Ada Se
s:
Usay Yaqeen Ho Jaye Kuch Iss Ada Se
Sunana Hall-E-Dil Hmara Ajnabi …
Woh Khud Hi Keh De Kisi Ko Tarpana Buri Baat Hai

st: Hum Aa Ke Tere Shaher Se Wapas Na Jaye
s:
Hum Aa Ke Tere Shaher Se Wapas Na Jaye
Yeh Faisla Kiya Hai Tughe Dekhne Ke Baad
Kahte Hai Tum Ko Log Maseeha Magar Yaha
Ak Shaks Mar Gaya Hai Tumhe Dekhne Ke Baad

st: Ek Ajnabi Se Mujhe Itna Pyaar Kyon Hai,
s:
Ek Ajnabi Se Mujhe Itna Pyaar Kyon Hai,
Inkar Karne Par Chahat Ka Ikraar Kyon Hai,
Use Pana Nahi Meri Taqdeer Mein Shayad,
Phir Har Mod Pe Usi Ka Intezaar Kyon Hai.!

st: Zindagi Mein Har Chiz Pahli Baar Hoti Hai
s:
Zindagi Mein Har Chiz Pahli Baar Hoti Hai
Kahin Kisi Se Pyaar To Kahin Takrara Hoti Hai
Jo Kya Hua Ke Hum Ajnabi Hai Aapke Liye
Magar Dosti Ajnabiyon Se Hi Pahli Baar Hoti Hai

st: Us Ajnabi Ka Yun Na Intzaar Karo
s:
Us Ajnabi Ka Yun Na Intzaar Karo
Is Aashiq Dil Ka Na Aitbaar Karo
Roj Nikla Kare Kisi Ki Yaad Me Ansu
Itna Kabhi Kisi Se Na Pyaar Karo

st: Ek Ajnabi Hay Magar,Rooh-Shanas Lagta Hy
s:
Ek Ajnabi Hay Magar,Rooh-Shanas Lagta Hy
Meri Tarha Mujhy,Wo Bhi Udaas Lagta Hy
Karon Talash Tou Ho Shak Wajood Pe Us K
Jo Aankhain Band Karon,Aas Paas Lagta Hay

st: Kabhi Wo Hum Pe Jaan Dia Karti Thi
s:
Kabhi Wo Hum Pe Jaan Dia Karti Thi
Jo Kehtay They Wo Maan Lia Karti Thi
Kal Anjaan Ban Kar Paas Se Guzar Gai
Woh Jo Door Se Pehchaan Lia Karte Thi…
